text: Steckborn is a former district of the canton of Thurgau. The capital city was Steckborn. It contains the following municipalities: Municipality Population (31 Dec 2005) Area, km² Berlingen 784 4.0 Eschenz 1574 12.0 Herdern 928 13.7 Homburg 1435 24.1 Hüttwilen 1371 17.6 Mammern 562 5.5 Müllheim 2536 8.7 Pfyn 1862 13.0 Raperswilen 408 7.7 Salenstein 1212 6.6 Steckborn 3398 8.8 Wagenhausen 1554 11.2 Total 17,624 132.9 Category:Former districts of Thurgau
title: Steckborn District
